modName: Dragonscale UNPB BBP and BBPx for or not PCEAr
summary:
Dragonscale UNPB BBP and BBPx for PCEAr or NOT
I would like to thank all of you guys for all your support, comments and endorsements. Thank you.
descriptionHtml:
====
Download These Amazing Music | Mod Information Below
[img]http://s29.postimg.org/5otjl4nyr/Smoke_Once_With_I_Z_93_x_93.gif[/img]
[onorezdiLP015] The Specialist (Jan. 19. 2014)
[url=https://archive.org/details/OnorezdiLP015][img]https://archive.org/download/OnorezdiLP015/Japanese%20Tattoo%20Designs4.jpg[/img][/url]
([url=https://archive.org/download/OnorezdiLP015/OnorezdiLP015_vbr_mp3.zip]Here[/url])(Optional)
====

Adds Completely Standalone Dragonscale UNPB BBP and BBPx NO DAM REplacer if you don't like it!

I Have Been Given Permission.

REQ body that uses (BBP) UNPB preferred
For PCEAr get > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/1000032632]Dragonscale UNPB BBPx PCEAr[/url] in Files Section
For REPLACER get > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/1000032636]Dragonscale REPLACER ONLY[/url] REPLACER DOES NOT NEED PCEAr

To Install DRAG AND DROP! Fixed and Tested.
These is not a .esp you just need PCEAr

Yes "Standalone comes with it's on texture/models path"

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16815]PC Exclusive Armor Path[/url]


Chinese Board for Chinese speakers.
[url=http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-3868980-1-1.html]???????N????????????[/url]

Install

PC:/.../Data
PLANS To make replacers that use other texture standalone VERY TIME CONSUMING....

Armors Converted
Dragonscale BBP CHSBHC/UNPB/CBBE comparability

Replacers for Female Daedric and Female Dragonscale armors. All credit goes to the original authors.
I've modified the meshes from Daedric Chain for UNP and UNPB Dragonscale chainmail
Also fixed the lower version on the Dragonscale armor, and put panties on the Daedric armor.




v2 Repload and fixed
..............................
v1 Edited Upload & then taken down due to issues
..............................
Information Below is Outdated v1 .:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

.:::::: NOTES :::::::::.
If You don't Want to use PCEAr
Copy the files in "custom" folder
and put in the meshes/textures -> armor folder instead.

In Depth
You want as a re placer only open my download files you should see

meshes/armor/custom/dragonscale
textures/armor/custom/dragonscale

manual skip the custom folder and put "Dragon-scale folder"
In the armor folder of your Data files.
You want to use PCEAr just drop all in data folder and overwrite.
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Credits and thanks:
architeuthisinfitialis for UNPB Dragonscale chainmail
MAK07 for Dragonscale version
Unknown Author for Daedric Chain for UNP
lustrianna for LustDesign - Female Daedric Armor Replacer
crispiniscool for HDLU - UNP UNPB
calyps and xp32 and mrtroublemaker for UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - With Optional BBP Breast Physics
dimon99 for DIMONIZED UNP female body
::::::::::::::::::: Last Words ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
Respect the credits and or said authors are you will be blocked.
::::::::::::::::::: Last Words ^::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
